summary: Comprehensive frontend testing completed for TaraVera Bio biotech website. All 14 test features passed successfully. Multi-page website structure with Home, Science, Programme, About Us, and News pages working correctly.

navigation.details: Navigation bar shows exactly: Home | Science | Programme | About Us | News

details: Hero headline 'Precision where biology diverges.' displayed correctly
All 4 body paragraphs about TaraVera Bio displayed
'Our Programme' button navigates to Programme page
'About Us' button navigates to About Us page
Biology section with 'What drives disease progression' found
Biomarker section with 'How we measure and translate biology' found
Patient Benefit section with 'Why tau clearance matters' found
Lead Programme section merged at top
Headline 'Restoring Tau Homeostasis Through Enzymatic Control' displayed
Outcome callout 'Outcome: a first-in-class, disease-modifying programme...' present
Development pathway diagram with all 8 steps displayed
Sub-navigation buttons 'Vision and Values' and 'Management Team' present
All 4 Values cards present: Patients First, Integrity-Driven Science, Collaborative by Design, Access-Minded Innovation
Management Team section with 6 placeholder cards displayed
Anchor navigation working for both sections

navigation_links.details: All navigation links work correctly between pages

mobile_menu.details: Mobile hamburger menu works correctly with all 5 navigation links

dark_mode.details: Dark mode toggle works across all pages

footer.details: Footer displays with Quick Links and About Us sections

critical_code_review_comments: All pages have proper data-testid attributes for testing
Responsive design implemented with mobile menu
Dark mode toggle persists across pages
All content matches requirements from PDF
seed_data_creation: None - all content is hardcoded in frontend components
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 14 test features passed. Website is a static multi-page React app with no backend APIs. Dark mode toggle works. Mobile responsive design implemented. All navigation and content verified.
